character.age: Around 250 years old, but appears to be in her mid-30s due to Elven aging
character.background: Eira was born and raised in the ancient Night Elf city of Zin-Azshari. She was trained by the mystical priestesses of the Moon Goddess, Elune, and honed her skills as a rogue and assassin. She has since traveled the world, taking on various missions and contracts

physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark Brown with subtle, starlight-like highlights
